mapper.select: SELECT USERID, USERNAME, TO_CHAR(INDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') INDATE FROM TUSER ORDER BY INDATE DESC
SELECT USERID, PASSWD, USERNAME, TO_CHAR(INDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') INDATE FROM TUSER WHERE USERID = #{id}
SELECT USERID, PASSWD, USERNAME, TO_CHAR(INDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') INDATE FROM TUSER WHERE USERNAME LIKE '%' || #{name} || '%' ORDER BY USERNAME ASC
SELECT USERID, PASSWD, USERNAME, TO_CHAR(INDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') INDATE FROM TUSER WHERE USERID = #{userid} AND PASSWD = #{passwd}
mapper.update: INSERT INTO USERS( USERID, PASSWD, USERNAME, EMAIL, USER_LOCAL, RIDER) VALUES (#{userid}, #{passwd}, #{username}, #{email} , #{user_local} , #{rider})
